story:
THE INHERITORS comic book


This world is like nothing you've ever seen!  This is the world of ENTOMO, where giant insects roam, strange vegetation is abundant and all sorts of Entomoid kingdoms vie for supremacy.

In this backdrop a young PRINCE ZEN is involved in a forbidden love affair with a Bugari maid, LADY FAYAWAY, and must escape the kingdom of STRATA, the only home he's ever known, and struggle to survive together in the savage lands beyond.

 

WHO AM I AND WHAT AM I DOING HERE?

I'm ANTHONY WAYNE PETTUS, the author and illustrator of this comic book project and I started IMPETTUS ENTERTAINMENT to create utter madness? What? -- NO! To bring a new look to the field of comics.  I wanted to use my background as a writer and director (of most notably the movie MINDBENDERS) to bring a cinematic sweep and look along with interesting and dynamic characters that you can care about. I want to make each book an event just like when you're anticipating a great movie that you can't wait to see just as I felt when I was a kid (or adult for that matter, I'm still a big kid). That's why I created THE INHERITORS.

WHAT YOU CAN DO?

You've got it easy! Just enjoy my video and sample pages from my book and decide you'd like to see this book made.  A $5 contribution will get you your own copy of the first issue of THE INHERITORS as well as cover the delivery cost.

For those who can pay a little more we have HIGHER REWARD TIERS specially for INDIEGOGO pledges that will give you GREAT souvenir PAGES OF ART signed by me of different exciting characters that are in or will be in the book. Hey, who knows? it may have historic significance one day!  I still kick myself for once having the first SPIDER-MAN and FANTASTIC FOUR and other iconic comic books when I was a kid. I still don't know what happened to those books.

WHAT DO I NEED YOUR MONEY FOR?

To pay for coloring this bad boy and to pay for publishing of course.  People good at what they do have to get paid.  That's the real world.  You'll see in my video the difference between seeing my book in color and seeing it in black and white.  In the bright colorful world in which my characters inhabit, it would be cheating you to show it any other way than the way it should be shown in all its glory.

HOW DO YOU KNOW I'LL DELIVER?

The only person that wants you to get a copy of my book more than you is ME!  If you aren't happy, I'm not happy.  The reason for doing all this is for you to see this great book when it's ready and continue seeing my work in the future. Let's make THE INHERITORS happen. 

You can contact me a variety of ways through Facebook, Twitter, IMPETTUS.COM (my website), or at a comic con or through my friends.  I value your patronage and will answer your messages personally.  If I screw up and forget to answer just send a reminder -- I'll get back to you if I'm not in the hospital or something (perish the thought).  We really need your help here. Please help us makes THE INHERITORS a reality!

Other Ways You Can Help

Get out the word about THE INHERITORS amongst your friends and social groups and use the INDIEGOGO tools available to spread the word about us.
story_txt:
THE INHERITORS comic book
This world is like nothing you've ever seen!  This is the world of ENTOMO, where giant insects roam, strange vegetation is abundant and all sorts of Entomoid kingdoms vie for supremacy.
In this backdrop a young PRINCE ZEN is involved in a forbidden love affair with a Bugari maid, LADY FAYAWAY, and must escape the kingdom of STRATA, the only home he's ever known, and struggle to survive together in the savage lands beyond.
 


WHO AM I AND WHAT AM I DOING HERE?
I'm ANTHONY WAYNE PETTUS, the author and illustrator of this comic book project and I started IMPETTUS ENTERTAINMENT to create utter madness? What? -- NO! To bring a new look to the field of comics.  I wanted to use my background as a writer and director (of most notably the movie MINDBENDERS) to bring a cinematic sweep and look along with interesting and dynamic characters that you can care about. I want to make each book an event just like when you're anticipating a great movie that you can't wait to see just as I felt when I was a kid (or adult for that matter, I'm still a big kid). That's why I created THE INHERITORS.


WHAT YOU CAN DO?
You've got it easy! Just enjoy my video and sample pages from my book and decide you'd like to see this book made.  A $5 contribution will get you your own copy of the first issue of THE INHERITORS as well as cover the delivery cost.
For those who can pay a little more we have HIGHER REWARD TIERS specially for INDIEGOGO pledges that will give you GREAT souvenir PAGES OF ART signed by me of different exciting characters that are in or will be in the book. Hey, who knows? it may have historic significance one day!  I still kick myself for once having the first SPIDER-MAN and FANTASTIC FOUR and other iconic comic books when I was a kid. I still don't know what happened to those books.
WHAT DO I NEED YOUR MONEY FOR?
To pay for coloring this bad boy and to pay for publishing of course.  People good at what they do have to get paid.  That's the real world.  You'll see in my video the difference between seeing my book in color and seeing it in black and white.  In the bright colorful world in which my characters inhabit, it would be cheating you to show it any other way than the way it should be shown in all its glory.
HOW DO YOU KNOW I'LL DELIVER?
The only person that wants you to get a copy of my book more than you is ME!  If you aren't happy, I'm not happy.  The reason for doing all this is for you to see this great book when it's ready and continue seeing my work in the future. Let's make THE INHERITORS happen. 
You can contact me a variety of ways through Facebook, Twitter, IMPETTUS.COM (my website), or at a comic con or through my friends.  I value your patronage and will answer your messages personally.  If I screw up and forget to answer just send a reminder -- I'll get back to you if I'm not in the hospital or something (perish the thought).  We really need your help here. Please help us makes THE INHERITORS a reality!
Other Ways You Can Help


Get out the word about THE INHERITORS amongst your friends and social groups and use the INDIEGOGO tools available to spread the word about us.

story:
"Imprisoned in her mystical sleep for fifteen hundred years, give or take, Morgan Le Fay has been discovered & restored to a shadow of her former glory by a cabal of powerful beings calling themselves the Triple Moon. For no less than thirteen years, Le Fay will serve this group, and at the end of that service she will be given the means by which she can restore her power. Until that time, she will be their trouble shooter, on call 24/7, no job too big or too small. The Triple Moon’s very own private investigator." Paul- Pullbox Reviews

This is a modern take on the classic villain from Arthurian legend brought into the present in an urban setting. Ever wonder what Jessica Jones would be like if she happened to be a powerful sorceress? That's Le Fay in a nutshell.

WHAT ARE YOU CROWDFUNDING?

  • This is a 32 page full color comic, single (third) issue of a series.
  • Urban Fantasy Noir genre
  • Mature Readers

New to Le Fay? Read 10 pages of issue 1 HERE

 

Joshua Metzger - Writer/Creator

Writes the crime comics Punch Drunk (Arcana Comics) and Metzger and Pawlak Presents: Villain (Evoluzione Publishing).

 

Miguel Angel Ruiz - Artist

Miguel Angel Ruiz, was born in 1984 in Córdoba, a little city in the south of Spain.

He began his carrer in animation world, studing animation during two years, then was working in three films of spanish productions,three years later he moved to Mexico and worked in his fisrt comics for indy companies, then when he returned to Spain, studied Illustration carrer in Art School of Córdoba, while he was working in Farscape Scorpious for Boom Studios.  When he finished his studies, started to work in Crossed Badlands for Avatar press, Miguel Angel still working in indie comics since that moments, have worked in Arclight comics, Sygn media, Genuine comics etc...Currently  Miguel Angel is working for Evoluzione Publishing making the art of Le Fay, and covers for another titles.

Vittorio Astone - Colorist

Hi, I'm Vittorio Astone and I'm a professional comic book artist and freelancer concept artist. I've published some short stories with Heavy Metal Magazine and Editoriale Aurea's Lanciostory and now I'm working with Vault Comics on an upcoming comic book series. As a concept artist, I'm currently working as a freelancer for private clients.

story:
Feminist as What?!


Feminist AF is the work of Pia Alize and Malathi Jogi, originally published online as "Custom Cuts". It's a 32pg comic exploration of feminism today, and why it's important for our feminism to be international +  intersectional. 


Why comics?

Well, that's what we do. They're fast, fun and easy to read. Over the past few years, Ad Astra Comix (that's us!) has published eight comics projects dealing with different social justice themes. Feminist AF is our next project, and we're excited to bring a simple and affordable comic about feminism to the public at large! 

...That's where you come in! We're a small publisher and we rely on  pre-order campaigns to finance our print runs. By supporting this crowdfunder, you'll be helping us print hundreds --hopefully thousands of copies. We want to see this accessable and affordable feminist comic  find its way into classrooms, cafes and bookstores across the continent.  In this way, you'll be helping carry on the conversation about what it means to be feminist.


 

Helping us get there

Like we said, We need your help! Publishing comics is a resource-intensive project, and lots of unpaid hours go into making each of our books happen - from promotional work to layouts, to our shipping parties. Reaching our goal all helps us breath a little easier as we make these projects happen! 


Here's what you can do:

  • Order yourself a copy of the comic (or two. Yea, maybe two).
  • Do you think your feminist pals would be into this project? Let them know about it!
  • While you're at it, share this like you would a viral news story about Trump saying something appalling. (If we could get a share for every 100 Trump-horrorshares, we'd be fully funded by the time you finished reading this!)
     

Why Should You Support FAF?


Risks & Challenges

All publishing projects have their risks and challenges - usually, by the time a comic is going to print, the biggest risks and challenges have been settled! Feminist AF is such a project: the comics are finished and the book is ready to go to print.

Our goal is always: run a campaign in the black. Books printed by larger publishers can reach deep into their pockets and run book production at a loss until the title is able to be sold in the store. We don't have that kind of luxury; instead, we use a more democratic model (crowdfunding!) to get the job done. ...Hey, thanks to you, that is!  

In order to print this comic and make sure our creators get their copies sent / royalties paid, we want to reach our goal of $3,500. The only risk we face is not making this goal (which is unlikely given the range of our previous crowdfunders).  But if we do not, we will simply lower the print-run and take a small profit loss on the sales of the book moving forward. The short answer to the question of this risk is: we've gone to print with every project we've ever run.

Ad Astra Comix is Its Support Network 

Remember: every comic we print is crowdfunded! That means that nothing goes to print without popular demand and support. It's with help from you - friends, family, comrades - that we make cool projects like Feminist AF possible! <3 

Have any questions about this project? E-mail us! 

Want to help us boost our campaign? Share these posts on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram + Tumblr.
